text: Nguoi (hoi Thien Su Muhammad) hay noi (voi nhung ke đa than): “Cac than linh ma cac nguoi tho phuong ngoai Allah co kha nang khoi tao (vu tru) va tai tao no khong?” Nguoi (hoi Thien Su Muhammad) hay noi voi chung: “Allah khoi tao (vu tru) va tai tao no tro lai.” Vay sao cac nguoi van con xa lanh (chan ly)?”
